MCQ: What is the main goal of machine learning?
Choices: a: To enable AI to imitate human learning | b: To provide accurate predictions | c: To automate complex tasks | d: To store and analyze large datasets

MCQ: Which of the following is NOT a part of the learning process in a machine learning algorithm?
Choices: a: Decision Process | b: Error Function | c: Optimization Process | d: Training Phase

MCQ: What type of machine learning uses labeled datasets to train its algorithm?
Choices: a: Supervised Learning | b: Unsupervised Learning | c: Semi-supervised Learning | d: Reinforcement Learning

MCQ: Which of the following is NOT an advantage of machine learning?
Choices: a: Pattern recognition | b: Personalized experiences | c: Elimination of human intervention | d: Large training dataset requirement

MCQ: What ethical concern arises when machine learning algorithms are trained on biased data?
Choices: a: Technological Singularity | b: Privacy Issues | c: Bias and Discrimination | d: AI Impact on Jobs
